subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Bradley Wright-Phillips, a revelation for the Red Bulls this year, attributed much of his goal-scoring success to Thierry Henry, the former Arsenal goal scorer who has embraced his role as a playmaker.
snippet: Bradley Wright-Phillips, a revelation for the Red Bulls this year, attributed much of his goal-scoring success to Thierry Henry, the former Arsenal goal scorer who has embraced his role as a playmaker.
